body: Instead of making a new tensor, we should just grab the data directly out of the storage object. Note: `tensor.numel()` is not necessarily the length of the storage! It might point somewhere in the middle of the storage with a non-zero storage offset.
body_html: Instead of making a new tensor, we should just grab the data directly out of the storage object. Note: tensor.numel() is not necessarily the length of the storage! It might point somewhere in the middle of the storage with a non-zero storage offset.
body_text: Instead of making a new tensor, we should just grab the data directly out of the storage object. Note: tensor.numel() is not necessarily the length of the storage! It might point somewhere in the middle of the storage with a non-zero storage offset.
